base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with modern design.
part_description: Features a large front panel and four smaller top compartments, all rectangular and evenly spaced.
internal_interaction_description: The front panel likely serves as a door or cover, possibly hinged or sliding, allowing access to internal storage. The top compartments may be separate sections for organizing smaller items, possibly with individual doors or open access for easy retrieval.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or integrated into a room setup for storage. It interacts with users by providing organized space, possibly requiring manual operation to open or close compartments, enhancing room aesthetics and functionality.
